meanings.definition: The business or profession of an agent.
meanings.sent1: In the world of agentry, agents work hard to represent their clients.
meanings.sent2: She decided to pursue a career in agentry after studying business management.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show featured a hilarious skit about the chaotic life of agentry.
meanings.sent4: The agentry in the movie industry can be compared to a complex web of connections.
meanings.sent5: The book vividly described the glamorous side of agentry in the entertainment world.

meanings.sent1: The agentry gathered for a meeting to discuss upcoming projects.
meanings.sent2: The agentry collaborated to secure a deal for their clients.
meanings.sent3: During the event, the agentry accidentally mixed up their name tags.
meanings.sent4: The agentry in the spy novel operated in secrecy to achieve their mission.
meanings.sent5: The unity among the agentry was evident in their coordinated efforts.
